entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
